comment: The online book/homework/test program she uses in her class is terrible, but not entirely her fault. Doesn't really give one-on-one time to help students. She posts her notes online with step-by-step problems. Everything but the midterm and final are online, but there are also pop quizzes that could harm your grade if not prepared.

very hot teacher.she teaches only for about 45min.gives everything on power point.even though i got a clean A, you have to really work for it.there's lots of work to do in this class.(quiz on every lecture.2 homework per week,5chapter assessment,mid term and final exams.take her if you are good in math.she assumes you already know math.
I was really close to passing, but it was my fault not hers, she does not baby you. She is helpful if you allow her to be.

She was an ok teacher; not bad but not amazing. She taught all the material through powerpoint and made sure everyone understood. Also, she wasn't very personably, but if you don't mind that then you will like her class.
she was great and the work was easy . Every thing was online so you didt the work on your own time before the time limit. i love the way she dresses and she's very pretty .
BEST TEAHER I HAVE EVER HAD!!! She gives EASY homework. Midterm and Final, she lets you pick what problems YOU want to do. AWESOME and VERY pretty! VERY helpful! I LOVE HER!!!!!!!!!!! GET HERRRR!!!!
